word:
Oh, how thankful I am that Jesus has revealed Himself unto you in Battle Creek!  I hope and pray that the church in Battle Creek may follow on to know the Lord until they shall know His goings forth are prepared as the morning. Light, precious light, is to shine upon God's commandment-loving people. Satan meditates their destruction, but Jesus has thoughts of mercy upon them. Then let there not be one doleful note sounded, for the church is the special 


                                   -169- 

object of His care and of His love. Talk faith; always talk hope; talk courage.--Letter 103, 1893, pp. 1, 2. (To Brother and Sister Amadon, June 15, 1893.)
